Articles.Content:
The Sand-storm is a small all terrain vehicle with a suspention system designed to absorb all the bumps from off road driving.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The suspension system was inspired from one of Vangani's videos and seems to work quite well. The vehicle is primarily powered by a large fuel cell and currently carries a large fuel tank as well as a smaller reserve tank. The large tank can be removed so that it can be replaced with more useful equipment. The car also has 4 small aircraft wheels that can be deployed to help repair the main wheels.

Action groups

1: Activate fuel cell

2: Deactivate fuel cell

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/aqzjixsjhtz0ld8/Sand-%20storm.craft?dl=0

Edited July 13, 2015 by mrmcp1
This is nice and all, but can it play darude?
